# 1. eopn

逆向找规律破解得到表格，或者日后再说，先观察




## 1.1. HANON

```
 test_eopn> $aaa=Get-Content C:\Users\admin\Documents\Tridu33\freepiano\!song\EOP全家桶\eopn\test_eopn\HANON1.txt
 test_eopn> $bbb=Get-Content C:\Users\admin\Documents\Tridu33\freepiano\!song\EOP全家桶\eopn\test_eopn\HANON2.txt
 test_eopn> Compare-Object $aaa $bbb


```

1234567_finger，仅仅加了两个手指12
